thread.title: Murder conspiracy charge may lead to Lapeer teens tried as adults
thread.title_full: Murder conspiracy charge may lead to Lapeer teens tried as adults

author: Roberto Acosta | racosta1@mlive.com
title: Murder conspiracy charge may lead to Lapeer teens tried as adults
text: A 14-year-old student and two 15-year-old students were charged with conspiracy to commit first-degree murder during court hearings Tuesday, Feb. 28 in addition to previous charges after texts were discovered with the discussion.
